sourcesContent:
import React, { CSSProperties, useMemo } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Button } from "reactstrap"; import { BsArrowRight, BsTelephoneFill, BsCheckCircleFill } from "react-icons/bs"; //import clevelandHero from "../../assets/cleveland-hero.png"; const styles = { pageWrap: { background: "#f6f7fb" } as CSSProperties, hero: { position: "relative", minHeight: 320, display: "flex", alignItems: "flex-end", overflow: "hidden", } as CSSProperties, heroBg: (imgUrl: string) => ({ position: "absolute", inset: 0, backgroundImage: `linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(11,18,32,0.72) 0%, rgba(11,18,32,0.55) 45%, rgba(11,18,32,0.20) 70%, rgba(11,18,32,0.15) 100%), url(${imgUrl})`, backgroundSize: "cover", backgroundPosition: "center", transform: "scale(1.02)", } as CSSProperties), heroInner: { position: "relative", zIndex: 2, width: "100%", padding: "28px 0 36px", color: "white", } as CSSProperties, crumb: { display: "inline-flex", gap: 10, alignItems: "center", fontWeight: 800, opacity: 0.9, textDecoration: "none", color: "white", fontSize: "0.95rem", } as CSSProperties, title: { fontSize: "2.5rem", fontWeight: 950, letterSpacing: "-0.03em", marginTop: 10, lineHeight: 1.05, } as CSSProperties, sub: { marginTop: 10, maxWidth: 820, opacity: 0.92, lineHeight: 1.65, } as CSSProperties, section: { padding: "56px 0" } as CSSProperties, card: { borderRadius: 18, border: "1px solid rgba(11,18,32,0.10)", background: "#fff", padding: 18, boxShadow: "0 10px 28px rgba(11,18,32,0.06)", } as CSSProperties, sidebarCard: { borderRadius: 18, border: "1px solid rgba(11,18,32,0.10)", background: "#0b1220", padding: 18, color: "white", boxShadow: "0 12px 30px rgba(11,18,32,0.12)", } as CSSProperties, h2: { fontSize: "1.7rem", fontWeight: 950, letterSpacing: "-0.02em", marginBottom: 10, } as CSSProperties, muted: { color: "rgba(11,18,32,0.74)", lineHeight: 1.7 } as CSSProperties, listItem: { display: "flex", gap: 10, alignItems: "flex-start" } as CSSProperties, pill: { display: "inline-flex", alignItems: "center", gap: 8, padding: "8px 12px", borderRadius: 999, background: "rgba(255,255,255,0.10)", border: "1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.16)", fontWeight: 800, } as CSSProperties, }; export default function ShellAbout() { const phone = "(216) 555-0100"; const heroBgStyle = useMemo(() => styles.heroBg("images/cleveland-2.png"), []); return (
{/* Inner hero */}
Home → About
About YourBrand
This is your secondary-page hero. One clear paragraph that explains who you are, the mission, and what to expect when someone works with you.
Local expertise Clear process Proven outcomes
{/* Content + sidebar */}
Our story
Replace this with your long-form about copy. Keep it scannable:
  • Who you serve
  • How you do it
  • Why you’re different
  • What the first step looks like
How we work
Add a short “process” section (3–5 steps). People love clarity.
1) Step name
One sentence about what happens.
2) Step name
One sentence about what happens.
3) Step name
One sentence about what happens.
{/* Sidebar */}
Talk to someone today
Add your “consultation” promise: what you’ll cover, how long it takes, and what they’ll leave with.
Quick facts
  • Years in business: ____
  • Customers served: ____
  • Service area: ____
  • Response time: ____
{/* Values */}
Our values
Value One
One sentence about this value.
Value Two
One sentence about this value.
Value Three
One sentence about this value.
{/* Team anchor */}
Meet the team
Add team bios here. You can keep it to 2–4 cards and link to full bios.
{[1, 2, 3].map((n) => (
Person {n}
Title / specialty
))}
{/* FAQ */}
FAQ
{[ "What happens in the first consultation?", "How quickly can you start?", "What should I bring / prepare?", ].map((q) => (
{q}
Placeholder answer. Keep it short and confidence-building.
))}
{/* Footer (simple) */}
YourBrand
Cleveland, OH
{phone}
Home Services Contact
{/* Responsive */}
); }
